name: Stock Balance by Batch
query:
SELECT 
    sle.company as "Company:Link/Company:100",
    sle.warehouse as "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:100",
    ti.item_group as "Item Group:Link/Item Group:120", 
    sle.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:120",
    ti.item_name as "Item Name::150",
    sle.stock_uom as "UOM:Link/UOM:3",
    sle.batch_no as "Batch ID",
    tb.expiry_date as "Expiry Date" ,
    tb.production_date as "Production Date",
    SUM(sle.actual_qty)  as "Balance Qty:Float:140",
    AVG(sle.valuation_rate) as "AVG Cost:Float:140"
   -- CASE WHEN voucher_type = 'Stock Reconciliation' THEN SUM((sle.qty_after_transaction) - sle.actual_qty)
   --     ELSE SUM(sle.actual_qty)
   -- END as "Reconciliation Qty "
FROM
    `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle,
    `tabBatch` tb,
    `tabItem` ti
WHERE   sle.docstatus < 2
    AND sle.batch_no = tb.name
    AND sle.item_code = ti.name
GROUP BY sle.company , warehouse ,ti.item_group, sle.item_code , sle.batch_no , tb.expiry_date ,tb.production_date
